subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Denis Menchov won the Vuelta a España for the second time in three years yesterday in Madrid, beating Carlos Sastre by 3 minutes 31 seconds after 21 stages. “This is a party,” Menchov said. “This is much better than the last one. To be able to celebrate with the team is very important.” Menchov was handed the 2005 title after Roberto Heras was stripped of it for testing positive for EPO.
